templates.title: Docker Cron Restart Notifier
templates.name: docker-cron-restart-notifier
templates.description: This Docker image is designed to automatically restart specified Docker containers and send notifications to a Discord channel upon each restart. It's particularly useful for maintaining long-running services, ensuring they're periodically refreshed and stakeholders are informed of these actions.
templates.note: Automatically restart specified Docker containers and send notifications to a Discord channel
